item.title: Version 5.3.1
item.description:
Focusmo 5.3.1

Whatâ€™s New

  • Workspace: Set a default workspace for each task
  • Floating Button: Reset to default position to make it easier to find Thanks ygeorgik for suggestion
  • Calendar Events: Add default calendar events for each task Thanks grrstine for suggestion

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed: Menu bar complete not working Thank you ygeorgik for finding the bug
  • Fixed: Empty task showing in the menu bar Special thanks to ygeorgik for reporting
  • Fixed: Timer going in overtime instead of user decision screen
  • Fixed: Pomodoro timer not moving to next stage on auto break
  • Fixed: Tasks not removed from deep focus list on task completion or deletion
  • Fixed: Analytics cleanup removing the data
  • Fixed: Move to menu bar color white in light mode
